meanings.sent1: The enzymatic reaction was crucial for breaking down the food.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the enzymatic process in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The enzymatic dance of the molecules was quite a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as enzymatic as the catalyst in a chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: The enzymatic nature of the solution made it highly effective.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or produced by an enzyme.
meanings.sent1: The enzymatic activity of the protein was remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The body's enzymatic functions help in digestion.
meanings.sent3: The enzymatic teamwork of the enzymes was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent4: His words had an enzymatic effect on her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The enzymatic power of nature can be seen in the growth of plants.
